install.name: K2 - K2Tabber Free
install.author: WEBSELF.it
install.copyright: Copyright (c) 2010 WEBSELF S.n.c. All rights reserved.
install.description:
K2 Tabber Free

It creates a specific k2 template which divides your extrafileds in graphic tabs.
More Informations

param.name: ulstyle_free
param.label: Tab Menu Style - UL
param.description: Add your css styles to customize Tab's Menu (UL tag) - Don't add style tag

param.name: astyle_free
param.label: Tab Menu Style - A
param.description: Add your css styles to customize Tab's Menu (A tag) - Don't add style tag

param.name: contentstyle_free
param.label: Tab Content Style - DIV
param.description: Add your css styles to customize Tab's content (DIV tag) - Don't add style tag
